Material used.Description: Human dopaminergic neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y cells were grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium supplemented with fetal calf serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell lines expressing p.R68P in N-terminus showed no significant difference in apoptosis rate compared to wild-type (p=0.99).
Cell lines expressing p.E231G in kinase domain exhibited a greater percentage of apoptosis (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.
Cell lines expressing p.A339T in kinase domain exhibited a greater percentage of apoptosis (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.
Cell lines expressing p.I442T in kinase domain exhibited a greater percentage of apoptosis (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.
Cell lines expressing p.D525N in C-terminus exhibited a greater percentage of apoptosis (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.

Biological replicates.Description: Data are means ± standard error of the mean (SEM), from at least three independent experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Three readings per data point were taken in each experiment.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 expressing cell lines were used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No specific negative control mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test and one-way ANOVA were used to compare apoptosis rates.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Apoptosis rate similar to wild-type control under oxidative stress (p>0.05).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Apoptosis rate significantly higher than wild-type control under oxidative stress (p<0.005).

Material used.Description: Human dopaminergic neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y cells were grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium supplemented with fetal calf serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell lines expressing p.R68P in N-terminus showed no significant difference in ΔΨm compared to wild-type (p=0.99).
Cell lines expressing p.E231G in kinase domain exhibited a greater decrease in ΔΨm (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.
Cell lines expressing p.A339T in kinase domain exhibited a greater decrease in ΔΨm (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.
Cell lines expressing p.I442T in kinase domain exhibited a greater decrease in ΔΨm (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.
Cell lines expressing p.D525N in C-terminus exhibited a greater decrease in ΔΨm (p<0.005) compared to wild-type control.

Biological replicates.Description: Data are means ± standard error of the mean (SEM), from at least three independent experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Three readings per data point were taken in each experiment.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 expressing cell lines were used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No specific negative control mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test and one-way ANOVA were used to compare changes in ΔΨm.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: ΔΨm similar to wild-type control under oxidative stress (p>0.05).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: ΔΨm significantly decreased compared to wild-type control under oxidative stress (p<0.005).

Material used.Description: Human dopaminergic neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y cells were grown in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium supplemented with fetal calf serum.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell lines expressing p.R68P showed no significant difference in cell survival compared to wild-type (p=0.134).
Cell lines expressing p.E231G showed decreased cell survival compared to wild-type under oxidative stress.
Cell lines expressing p.A339T showed significant difference in cell survival with decreasing survival from homozygous to heterozygous to wild-type (p<0.0005).
Cell lines expressing p.I442T showed decreased cell survival compared to wild-type under oxidative stress.
Cell lines expressing p.D525N showed significant difference in cell survival with decreasing survival from homozygous to heterozygous to wild-type (p<0.0005).

Biological replicates.Description: Data are means ± standard error of the mean (SEM) from at least three independent experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: No specific mention of technical replicates for MTT assay in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 expressing cell lines were used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No specific negative control mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA with repeated measures and Student-Newman-Keuls post-hoc test were used to compare time-dependent cell survival.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell survival rate similar to wild-type control under oxidative stress (p>0.05).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell survival rate significantly lower than wild-type control under oxidative stress (p<0.0005).
